attributes.action: Why do I pay same money for small sized shoes as someone with large sized shoes?
attributes.additional_details: Why on earth do I, a normal sized human being, have to pay the same price for my normal sized shoes as these freaks with large feet?  It's an absolute joke man.  Is this a hidden freak, or circus tax.  Compare a UK size 6 or 7 with the size 1,000,000 that some of these monsters take ... and they're proud of it. "Look at my feet they say, my shoes are size 426,425,499."  They even take their shoes off an show them around.  Madness ... utter madness
